ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:18:31 [Issue ID 4000-42597] urn:comicvine:4000-42597 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:34:01. [Issue ID 59036]
ComicInfo.Summary: Truth on Trial: Enigma requests Woden to do something about Loki. In the process, he tries to make sense out of the previous 39 issues. Old Supreme now in the original Supreme's body, returns to Earth while Lady Supreme remains on Other Earth.
ComicInfo.Title: Truth on Trial
ComicInfo.Writer: Jim Valentino,Tom Bierbaum,Mary Bierbaum,Jim Valentino,Tom Bierbaum,Mary Bierbaum
